snippet: American interests demand that we support the moderate fighters against both Assad and the jihadists.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Robert S Ford, former American ambassador to Syria, makes case for providing training and material aid to Free Syrian Army so they can better combat both Pres Bashar al-Assad and jihadists; warns hesitation and unwillingness to commit to helping moderate opposition fighters will hasten day when American forces will have to intervene against Al Qaeda in Syria.
lead_paragraph: American interests demand that we support the moderate fighters against both Assad and the jihadists.

headline.print_headline: Why We Must Arm Syria’s Opposition
